slide.title: How do they relate
slide.blurb: *DNA* serves as the _information storage medium_, which is |ff0000|transcribed| into *RNA* (the _information transmission medium_), which is finally |ff0000|translated| by a ribosome into a *Protein*
An text composed of 3-letter words (with 4 unique letters) gets mapped into a sequence of 20 unique letters.

list.bullet: This is usually called "The Central Dogma of Biology"
